message: When I return to reality, I fall to my knees, unable to endure the pain wracking my body.
Drops of sweat rain down on the floor. Noiz wasn't holding back at all.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, be careful."
I look up. Noiz is standing in the same spot, watching me.
Suddenly, he lowers his hips―<?>
and charges.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Whoa!"
I block his right hook with both arms. The impact numbs me to the bone.
His assault continues, a storm of punches.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz...!"
Through my guard, I catch a glimpse of Noiz's face.
I was right. His eyes...
They're empty. Blank. The eyes of a man being controlled.
Just like Mizuki and Akushima.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guh?! Woah!"
Noiz suddenly shifts his target from my face to my stomach.
I quickly twist to avoid him, but he manages to graze my side.

The side with the burn.
<?>
Did he do that on purpose?
As if to answer my question, he begins to focus his attacks on that spot.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guuh...!"
I don't know if he recognizes me, but there's no question that he's trying to beat me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Stop it, Noiz!"
Noiz's expression is flat, his glassy stare unblinking as he attacks.
His relentless, mechanical punches force me to focus exclusively on defense.
I don't want to fight him like this!
I need a solution. My arms are going numb. I won't be able to hold out much longer.
